name: FasterThanLazers
description:
Your spaceship is entering a dangerous zone protected by lazer spheres. If only you had missiles... The only thing you can do is mimic the lazers with your shield.

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrows to move
SPACE to switch color
R to restart

I had to chose between a scoring system and explosions... So I hope you like explosions !

This game was made in 3 hours for the Trijam 71 with the theme "Lasers".

Feel free to check my other games or my soundcloud.
